name: 吳柏輝
objective:
人工智慧與程式設計之進階觀念介紹及應用。主要內容包括：1. 深度學習、2. 影像辨識與物件偵測、3. 對抗生成網路 (GAN)、4. 深度強化學習
This course covers the advanced and applications of artificial intelligence and program design, including, 1. Deep Learning, 2. Image Classification and Object Detection, 3. Generative Adversarial Networks, 4. Deep Reinforcement Learning.
